TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataBinding extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含有关 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的单个数据绑定表达式的信息，这些信息可让快速应用程序开发 (RAD) 设计器（如 Microsoft Visual Studio）能够在设计时创建数据绑定表达式。

span.span: Contains information about a single data-binding expression in an ASP.NET server control, which allows rapid-application development (RAD) designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, to create data-binding expressions at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器控件中的每个数据绑定表达式由的实例，在设计时表示类。Each data-binding expression in a server control is represented at design time by an instance of the class. 所有服务器控件，其中包含一个或多个数据绑定表达式都具有对象，其中包含对象。Any server control that contains one or more data-binding expressions has a object that contains the objects. 此集合是可通过访问类实现接口。This collection is accessible through the class implementing the interface. 当创建自定义的 RAD 设计器时，使用该实现来对集合的访问。When you create a custom RAD designer, use that implementation to access the collection. 任何或仅在设计时存在与服务器控件关联的对象。Any or objects associated with a server control exist only at design time. 它们在运行时不存在而，因此，不能在运行时。They do not exist at run time and, therefore, are not accessible during run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建对象并设置它对该控件的现有对象等于集合中具有`propertyName`参数值为`Text`。The following code example creates a object and sets it equal to an existing object in the control's collection that has a `propertyName` parameter with a value of `Text`. 如果集合包含对象`propertyName`值`Text`，此代码将返回的对象的值属性。If the collection contains a object with a `propertyName` value of `Text`, this code returns the value of the object's property. 如果没有此类对象，则返回空字符串 ("")。If there is no such object, it returns an empty string (""). [!code-csharp[DataBinding_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataBinding_Sample1/CS/databinding_samp1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataBinding_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataBinding_Sample1/VB/databinding_samp1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建对象并设置它对该控件的现有对象等于集合中具有`propertyName`参数值为`Text`。The following code example creates a object and sets it equal to an existing object in the control's collection that has a `propertyName` parameter with a value of `Text`. 如果集合包含对象`propertyName`值`Text`，此代码将返回的对象的值属性。If the collection contains a object with a `propertyName` value of `Text`, this code returns the value of the object's property. 如果没有此类对象，则返回空字符串 ("")。If there is no such object, it returns an empty string (""). summary.span: 检索 对象的实例的哈希代码。

span.span: Retrieves the hash code for an instance of the object.

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象都将置于对象，仅在设计时访问。 objects are placed in a object, accessible only at design time. 该集合为表示在控件上的绑定的哈希表。The collection is a hash table that represents the bindings on a control. 只能有一个绑定，每个属性，使哈希代码计算匹配属性实现并仅考虑到帐户名称。There can only be one binding per property, so the hash code computation matches the implementation and only takes the property name into account.

summary.span: 获取要将数据绑定到的 ASP.NET 服务器控件属性的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the ASP.NET server control property to bind data to.
The property to bind data to.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例声明了三个变量， `dataBindingOutput1`， `dataBindingOutput2`，和`dataBindingOutput3`，其的访问的不同属性对象， `myDataBinding2`。The following code example declares three variables, `dataBindingOutput1`, `dataBindingOutput2`, and `dataBindingOutput3`, which access the different properties of a object, `myDataBinding2`. 然后将分配的值属性`dataBindingOutput1`，将该值串联的字符串"属性名称为"，并将值写入到文件。It then assigns the value of the property to `dataBindingOutput1`, concatenates it with the string "The property name is ", and writes the value to a file.
